name: Shadow of Loot Box
description: Shadow of Loot Box is a first-person shooter about micropayments, loot boxes, cut content and everything we "love" in modern video games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with 1024MB Video RAM Storage: 800 MB available space
